pages.text: 19|12|(Soshite kare no musuko ni.)`Yahiyā yo, keiten o shikkari to mamore.'(To meirei ga kudatta). Soshite ware wa, yōshō (no toki) kare ni eichi o sazuke,
19|13|mata waga moto kara jiai to seijun'na kokoro o sazuketa. Kare wa omo o osore,
19|14|fubo ni kōkō de kōmandenaku, somuku koto mo nakatta.
19|15|Kare no seitan no hi, shikyo no hi, fukkatsu no hi ni, kare no ue ni heian'are.
19|16|Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, maruyamu (no monogatari) o nobeyo. Ka no on'na ga kazoku kara hanarete azuma no ba ni hiki komotta toki,
19|17|ka no on'na wa kare-ra kara (mi o saegiru) maku o tareta. Sonotoki ware wa waga seirei (jiburīru) o tsukawashita. Kare wa 1-ri no rippana ningen no sugata de kano on'na no mae ni arawareta.
19|18|Kano on'na wa itta. `Anata (jiburīru) ni taishite jihibukaki okata no mikago o inorimasu. Moshi anata ga,-nushi o osorete ora rerunaraba (watashi ni chikayoranaide kudasai).'
19|19|Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, anata no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shito ni suginai. Seijun'na musuko o anata ni sazukeru (shirase no) tame ni.'
19|20|Ka no on'na wa itta. `Imada katsute, dare mo watashi ni furemasen. Mata watashi wa futeide mo arimasen. Dōshite watashi ni musuko ga arimashou.'

19|21|Kare (tenshi) wa itta. `Sōdearou. (Daga) anata no omo wa ōse rareru. “Sore wa ware ni totte wa yōina kotodearu. Sore de kare (musuko) o hitobito e no shirushi to nashi, mata ware kara no jihi to suru tamedearu. (Kore wa sudeni) arrā no o meirei ga atta kotodearu.”'
19|22|Kōshite, ka no on'na wa kare (musuko) o ninshin shitanode, tōi tokoro ni hiki komotta.
19|23|Daga bunben no kutsū no tame ni, natsumeyashi no kan ni omomuki, ka no on'na wa itta. `Ā , kon'na kotoni naru mae ni, watashi wa naki mono ni nari, bōkyaku no naka ni kietakatta.'
19|24|Sonotoki (koe ga atte) ka no on'na o shita no kata kara yonda. `Kanashinde wa naranai. Omo wa anata no ashimoto ni Ogawa o tsukura reta.
19|25|Mata natsumeyashi no kan o, anata no kata ni yuriugokase. Shinsen'na juku shita natsumeyashi no mi ga ochite koyou.
